question.text: After the next {Shots on target}, continue tracking that team. Answers must be 'Trigger: {Shots on target} by left/right' and 'Then: <Event> by left/right' for {Throw-in, Shots off target, Shots on target and Kick-off}.

answer.text: Trigger: Shots on target by left
Then: Shots off target by left
Then: Shots on target by left
